t: Create PO, Questionary, and Roadmap agent definitions

notes: PO agent with model:opus, Modes 0-3, user_presentation output type, effort-based behavior table, owner-first proxy pattern preserved
Questionary agent with model:sonnet, 3-round protocol, scope_confidence early exit at 0.85, read-only, no user contact
Roadmap agent with model:sonnet, dependency_graph adjacency list, critical_path, topological sort with cycle detection, DAG guarantee
